column5: WHEN: We have enough participants to select now. Rosters will be posted by Thursday morning.  HOW: Participants have been numbered in the order they signed up (currently 1-50). When selection starts, we will use a random number generator (www.random.org) For example: Team 1 - <click> 28 = tjsa Team 2 - <click> 38 = worm dangler ... and so on. Subsequent dispersals will be done in the same manner in groups of 10 until the June 30 deadline.  If you haven't signed up yet, do it now! http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=39531
Thank you VERY MUCH for doing all this for us, cheers! Geoff
Woooooo, let's get the show on the road!
No problem, it's my pleasure. If I play my cards right, I might even get my 2010 OFC membership for free!

Hey Slowpoke thanks for all the hard work in putting this all together...this is my first year getting involved and am looking forward to a little healthy competition...Team Brifishrgy for the Cup!!!!
